GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the properties for an Azure Dev Spaces Controller.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates an Azure Dev Spaces Controller with the specified create parameters.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates the properties of an existing Azure Dev Spaces Controller with the specified update parameters.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing Azure Dev Spaces Controller.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all the Azure Dev Spaces Controllers with their properties in the specified resource group and subscription.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetControllers
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Lists all the Azure Dev Spaces Controllers with their properties in the subscription.

OtherOperations.Name: GetConnectionDetails
OtherOperations.Description: Lists connection details for the underlying container resources of an Azure Dev Spaces Controller.
